simbio.se.sau.persistense

Class PreferencesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • simbio.se.sau.persistense.PreferencesHelper

  • public class PreferencesHelper
extends Object
    A helper to use SharedPreferences
    Author:
    Ademar Alves de Oliveira ademar111190@gmail.com

        public PreferencesHelper(Context context)
        The default constructor
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(String key,
       boolean value)
        Put a Boolean value with SharedPreferences.Editor#putBoolean(String, boolean) method and committing it with SharedPreferences.Editor#commit().
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to modify.
        value - The new value for the preference.

      • put

        public void put(String key,
       float value)
        Put a Float value with SharedPreferences.Editor#putFloat(String, float) method and committing it with SharedPreferences.Editor#commit().
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to modify.
        value - The new value for the preference.

      • put

        public void put(String key,
       int value)
        Put a Integer value with SharedPreferences.Editor#putInt(String, int) method and committing it with SharedPreferences.Editor#commit().
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to modify.
        value - The new value for the preference.

      • put

        public void put(String key,
       long value)
        Put a Long value with SharedPreferences.Editor#putLong(String, long) method and committing it with SharedPreferences.Editor#commit().
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to modify.
        value - The new value for the preference.

      • put

        public void put(String key,
       String value)
        Put a String value with SharedPreferences.Editor#putString(String, String) method and committing it with SharedPreferences.Editor#commit().
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to modify.
        value - The new value for the preference.

      • put

        public void put(String key,
       Object value)
        Put a Object value with SharedPreferences.Editor#putString(String, String) method and committing it with SharedPreferences.Editor#commit(). Note the object will be transformed in a Json String with the method JsonUtils.toJson(Object) and saved like a string.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to modify.
        value - The new value for the preference.

      • getBoolean

        public boolean getBoolean(String key,
                 boolean def)
        Retrieve a Boolean value from the preferences with the SharedPreferences#getBoolean(String, boolean) method.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        def - Value to return if this preference does not exist.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or the def value.

      • getBooleanOrTrue

        public boolean getBooleanOrTrue(String key)
        Retrieve a Boolean value from the preferences with the SharedPreferences#getBoolean(String, boolean) method.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or true.

      • getBooleanOrFalse

        public boolean getBooleanOrFalse(String key)
        Retrieve a Boolean value from the preferences with the SharedPreferences#getBoolean(String, boolean) method.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or false.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or zero.

      • getStringOrNull

        public String getStringOrNull(String key)
        Retrieve a String value from the preferences with the SharedPreferences#getString(String, String) method.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or null.

      • getStringOrEmpty

        public String getStringOrEmpty(String key)
        Retrieve a String value from the preferences with the SharedPreferences#getString(String, String) method.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or a empty String.

      • getObject

        public Object getObject(String key,
               Class<?> theClass,
               Object def)
        Retrieve a Object value from the preferences with the SharedPreferences#getString(String, String) method. Note this will be retrive a String and try convert it to your Object with the method JsonUtils.fromJsonOrNull(String, Class).
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        theClass - The Class of object retrieved
        def - Value to return if this preference does not exist.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or the def value.

      • getObjectOrNull

        public Object getObjectOrNull(String key,
                     Class<?> theClass)
        Retrieve a Object value from the preferences with the SharedPreferences#getString(String, String) method. Note this will be retrive a String and try convert it to your Object with the method JsonUtils.fromJsonOrNull(String, Class).
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        theClass - The Class of object retrieved
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or null.
